{"id":545514253,"lang":"java","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1630141643,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/545514253/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"40.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        if(s.equals(\"\")) return 0;\n        int[] ch = new int[128];\n        Arrays.fill(ch,0);\n        int l=0,r=0;\n        boolean flag=false;\n        int m = s.length();\n        int ans=1;\n        while(r<m){\n            if(flag==false){\n                ans=Math.max(ans,r-l);\n                if(ch[s.charAt(r)]==1){\n                    flag=true;\n                }\n                ch[s.charAt(r)]++;\n                r++;\n            }\n            else{\n                if(ch[s.charAt(l)]==2){\n                    flag=false;\n                }\n                ch[s.charAt(l)]--;\n                l++;\n            }\n        }\n        if(flag==false){\n            ans=Math.max(ans,r-l);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
